description:
Estimate fwhm smoothness of a metric file.

Estimates the smoothness of the metric columns, printing the estimates to standard output.  These estimates ignore variation in vertex spacing.

surface.title: surface
surface.description: the surface to use for distance and neighbor information

opt_roi_roi_metric.title: opt_roi_roi_metric
opt_roi_roi_metric.description: use only data within an ROI: the metric file to use as an ROI

opt_column_column.title: opt_column_column
opt_column_column.description: select a single column to estimate smoothness of: the column number or name

opt_demean.title: opt_demean
opt_demean.description: subtract the mean image before estimating smoothness

anyOf.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each column separately

whole_file.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each column separately
